reuters.title: MOBIL FRANCE TO TAKE 10 PCT STAKE IN PRIMAGAZ
reuters.body: Mobil Corp's <MOB> Mobil Oil Francaise unit said it will take a stake of about 10 pct in the French butane and propane gas distribution company <Primagaz> in exchange for the transfer to Primagaz of Mobil's small and medium bulk propane activity. Small and medium bulk propane sales totalled 55,000 tonnes in 1986 and the transfer will increase total business of Primagaz by about 12 pct, equal to 32,000 extra customers. A Primagas spokesman said Mobil will take the stake by means of a capital increase, terms of which have not yet been established. 
